description:
The commander of Colombia’s largest FARC dissident group EMC claimed that his guerrillas supported President Gustavo Petro’s election campaign in 2022. In a post on social media platform X, EMC…

The post FARC dissidents claim guerrillas supported Petro in Colombia’s 2022 elections appeared first on Colombia News | Colombia Reports.
title: FARC dissidents claim guerrillas supported Petro in Colombia’s 2022 elections
